name: EdgeShift
description:
EdgeShift is a fun, engaging and simple arcade game that will challenge you!

Much more than a video game, EdgeShift tests your reflexes and reaction time at the same time.

Challenge your reflexes and your reaction time and those of your friends by playing this awesome arcade!

Turn the hexagon to match the color of the ball with the colors of the hexagonal sides, but be careful as it is not as easy as it might seem!

The speed of the ball increases slowly with your score to see how far can you get, increasing the difficulty and challenging your reflexes and your skills!

The game comes with 3 difficulty (Normal, Hard, Pain), these are the difficulties of starting, increasing the score the game becomes more and more difficult by adding speed to the ball, so the game challenges your reflexes and your reaction time .

EdgeShift features:

-The game comes with 3 difficulty (with a increasing difficulty system based on the score)

-Challenging game!

-Social game (Leadearboard and Facebook Score Share to challenge your friends)

How to play:

Tap the right or left side of your screen to turn the hexagon to the right or to the left.

The hexagon has 6 sides and so 6 colors, a different color for each side of the hexagon.

Also the ball in the middle of the hexagon has a color!

Turn the hexagon so the ball touches the side of the hexagon with the same color.

Your first ball is gray ,the gray ball can touch all hexagon sides.

Then the ball will change it`s color randomly every hexagon side touch.
